column4: i got xine to play MPEG movies, but now i'm getting an error about Audio codecs and i get no sound. where can i find the codecs i need?
This page of easyubuntu should do everything you need: http://easyubuntu.freecontrib.org/images/screenshot1.png
i just need to download and install easyubuntu?
Yes, then run it, then check/uncheck all the options you want...
wow, if it works, it should fix a LOT of my problems. thanks
anybody know if there is a way to get a Netgear wireless adapter to work in linux?
Google for the model number and add the word "Linux"
i used to run FC4 and i couldn't even get the CD to install
